mapper.insert: INSERT INTO answer ( answer_id, question_id, score, is_accepted, owner_user_id, creation_date ) VALUES ( #{answerId}, #{questionId}, #{score}, #{isAccepted}, #{ownerUserId}, #{creationDate} ) ON CONFLICT (answer_id) DO UPDATE SET question_id = EXCLUDED.question_id, score = EXCLUDED.score, is_accepted = EXCLUDED.is_accepted, owner_user_id = EXCLUDED.owner_user_id, creation_date = EXCLUDED.creation_date
